main.name: Henry Woo
main.mission: I'm currently seeking opportunities in Full Stack and Frontend Development.
main.description: Complementary to my interests in code, art, and math, I'm an engineer who enjoys application development and deep learning.
main.bio: I love to tinker, build, and learn.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with Honors / Minor in Electrical Engineering
education.description: Data Structures, Algorithms & Models for Computation, Systems Programming, UIUX, Virtual Reality, Applied Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Linear Algebra, Statistics, Data Mining
education.honors: Dean's List, James Scholar, Great Lakes STEM Scholar for Computer Science

education.description: Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Meta-Learning, Signal Processing

skills.name: Python | Pytorch | Data Visualizations | Numpy | Pandas | Flask

extras: Jane Street Electronic Trading Competition - First Place

projects.title: HuTaoBot
projects.category: Discord verified and Top.gg listed rolling simulator bot based on the top mobile game Genshin Impact by Mihoyo.

projects.title: Incremental Learning CGAN Reimplementation
projects.category: Helped a PhD student experiment with "Incremental Learning Using Conditional Adversarial Networks" Xiang et al. Experimented with architectural changes, hyperparameter tuning, and data visualizations.

projects.title: Wells Fargo Campus Analytics Challenge 2020
projects.category: Given a dataset, I employed a deep learning model to achieve high accuracies.

projects.title: UIUC Deep Learning Kaggle Class Competitions
projects.category: Shared knowledge with my classmates to help achieve high accuracy scores in our CS498DL course at UIUC. I post my standings here.

projects.title: Audio Digit Classification using Spectrograms
projects.category: Classified human spoken digits audio files using a CNN. (Machine Learning for Signal Processing Term Project)

projects.title: CycleGAN Reimplementation
projects.category: Reimplementation of CycleGAN architecture. (Deep Learning Term Project)

projects.title: Opico Emoji Keyboard
projects.category: I contributed to this open source project where I helped increase searchability of emojis through fuzzy search and expanding the keyword vocabulary.

projects.title: League of Legends Champion Stats
projects.category: Data visualizations and statistics on game characters. Written using ReactJS, Material-UI, Redis Queue, and Flask + mongoDB.

projects.title: pix2pix Pytorch Implementation
projects.category: Reimplementation of the popular CGAN written in Pytorch. (Computer Vision Term Project)

projects.title: Github App
projects.category: React Native mobile app for navigating Github. Includes 2FA authentication and a focus on modern aesthetic design.

testimonials.text: That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
